info.name: CRM Healthcare API
info.description: API collection untuk CRM Healthcare/Pharmaceutical Platform - Sales CRM

request.description: Login dengan email dan password. Response akan menyertakan JWT token dan refresh token.
Refresh access token menggunakan refresh token.

item.name: Master Data
User Management

request.description: Get list of users with pagination
Get user permissions in hierarchical menu structure

item.description: User Management endpoints untuk mengelola users, roles, dan permissions

item.name: Account Management

request.description: Get list of accounts with pagination

item.description: Account Management endpoints untuk mengelola accounts (Hospitals, Clinics, Pharmacies)

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category Management endpoints untuk mengelola account categories (Hospital, Clinic, Pharmacy)

item.name: Contact Roles

request.description: Get list of all contact roles
Get contact role details by ID

item.description: Contact Role Management endpoints untuk mengelola contact roles (Doctor, PIC, Manager, Other)

item.name: Contact Management

request.description: Get list of contacts with pagination

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "name": "Dr. John Doe",
  "role_id": "contact_role_id_here",
  "phone": "081234567890",
  "email": "doctor@example.com",
  "position": "Chief Medical Officer",
  "notes": "Primary contact for medical supplies"
}

item.description: Contact Management endpoints untuk mengelola contacts (Doctors, PICs, Managers)

item.name: Visit Reports

request.description: Get list of visit reports with pagination
Get visit report details by ID

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "visit_date": "2024-01-15",
  "purpose": "Sales visit to discuss new products",
  "notes": "Meeting went well, discussed pricing"
}

request.description: Check in to a visit report with GPS location
Check out from a visit report with GPS location
Reject a visit report with reason (supervisor action)
Upload a photo to a visit report

item.description: Visit Report Management endpoints untuk mengelola visit reports dengan check-in/out, GPS, dan dokumentasi foto

item.name: Dashboard

query.description: Number of top accounts to return
Number of top sales reps to return
Number of recent activities to return

item.description: Dashboard endpoints untuk mendapatkan overview dan statistik dashboard

item.name: Reports

request.description: Get visit report report with statistics
Export visit report report as CSV or Excel file
Export pipeline report as CSV or Excel file
Export sales performance report as CSV or Excel file
Get account activity report for a specific account
Export account activity report as CSV or Excel file

item.description: Report endpoints untuk generate berbagai jenis laporan

item.name: Activities

request.description: Get list of activities with pagination

item.description: Activity Tracking endpoints untuk mengelola activities dan timeline
Endpoints untuk master data Sales CRM

item.name: Visit Reports

request.description: Get list of visit reports with pagination (Mobile)
Get visit report details by ID (Mobile)

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "sales_rep_id": "sales_rep_id_here",
  "visit_date": "2024-01-15",
  "purpose": "Sales visit to discuss new products",
  "notes": "Meeting went well, discussed pricing"
}

request.description: Check in to a visit report with GPS location (Mobile - typically uses device GPS)
Check out from a visit report with GPS location (Mobile - typically uses device GPS)
Upload a photo to a visit report (Mobile - typically uploads from device camera/gallery)

item.description: Visit Report Management endpoints untuk Mobile Application dengan check-in/out, GPS, dan dokumentasi foto

request.description: Health check endpoint untuk memastikan API berjalan.
